name: codekaizen/wp-github-gist-block
description: WordPress plugin for embedding GitHub Gists as blocks

install-strauss: sh -c 'echo "checking strauss..."; test -f ./bin/strauss.phar && echo "strauss already downloaded" || echo "downloading strauss..." && curl -o bin/strauss.phar -L -C - https://github.com/BrianHenryIE/strauss/releases/latest/download/strauss.phar'
